pages.text: $(thing)Circus Coins$() are dropped by all mobs in $(thing)Celeve$(). They are used to trade with the Toy Merchant
The $(thing)Gravitator$() is an item that will slow down your fall speed when held. This makes it a useful item for exploration. It is sold by the Toy Merchant
This item is sold by the Toy Merchant, and will summon Gyro when used. It can be used anywhere, including in other dimensions
